root.name: Chex Quest 3
root.description: Chex Quest 3 was developed almost entirely by Charles Jacobi, former employee of Digital Café (the developers of the original games). The release of Chex Quest 3 included updated versions of the original 2 games. Chex Quest 3 is available as a download on Charles Jacobi's personal website. External Links Chucktropolis - Charles Jacobi's personal website, with Chex Quest download link

similar_games.game: Sonny's Race for the Chocolatey Taste
